item.title: Labs - Who we are
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: At Labs, our team is united by a shared passion for new technologies. We are a diverse group of individuals, each with unique backgrounds and personalities, but our common ground lies in our dedication to exploring and understanding emerging technologies.

item.title: Labs Team
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Latest from Labs Team Forward Engineering Publications Forward Engineering November 2023 Forward Engineering October 2023 Forward Engineering August 2023 Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) Who we are At Labs, our team is united by a shared passion for new technologies.

item.title: November Forward Engineering 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This month, we have focused on revamping how we learn, familiarize, and work with tech. We are excited to announce that we have updated our Forward Engineering to better reflect the feedback and insights from our Labs team, Operations Team, and Consulting Team.

item.title: Applying MPC for authentication for web3 Console
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Use Multi-Party Computation for secure authentication in a Web3 console environment: Research and implement MPC protocols suitable for authentication. Integrate MPC into the Console app for secure user authentication

item.title: Demo: Biometrics on the web (through external device connection)
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Implement biometric authentication for web applications via external devices: Research and select appropriate biometric hardware compatible with web applications. Develop a secure method for connecting and communicating with the external device.

item.title: Demo: Magic Links
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Implement a ‘Magic Link’ system for passwordless authentication: Develop an email-based authentication system where users receive a unique, time-sensitive link to log in.

item.title: Demo: QR Code based Login
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Create a QR code-based login system for easy and secure access to web applications: Design the QR code generation and scanning process.

item.title: Implement a rust game through WASM
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Design a simple game concept suitable for implementation in Rust. Develop the game logic and user interface in Rust. Compile and optimize the Rust code for WASM.

item.title: Implementing a game server on Rust
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Develop a robust and efficient game server using Rust. Design the server architecture with a focus on scalability and performance. Implement core server functionalities like player management, real-time communication, and game logic.

item.title: DuckDB demo and showcase
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Event Date Discord Channel Type 23/11/2023 üéô„Éªlabs-stage Internal DuckDB has been an emerging OLAP database for analytical needs. Use cases for analytics usually use around 1GB-10GB of data, not enough to take advantage of the full potential of databases in data warehouses.

item.title: How R&D contributes to Performance Review
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our organization values the research and development (R&D) efforts of our team members and aims to incorporate these contributions into performance reviews.

item.title: Knowledge Journey
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our process for evaluating and integrating technology is designed to be thorough yet efficient, ensuring we adopt only the most effective tools into our operations.

item.title: Labs - New Member Onboarding
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: New members joining our Labs team can be recommended either personally by an existing team member or through a development plan survey.

item.title: Labs - Topic proposal & progress tracking
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Selecting the right R&D topics is crucial for our organization’s growth. Currently, we are inviting topic proposals specifically from members of our labs, consulting and operation teams.

item.title: Labs Roadmap (Nov 23 update)
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In a recent collaborative discussion between key members of the Labs and Consulting teams, we’ve made decisive strides in pinpointing key topics and potential projects for development.

item.title: Labs x Consulting Workflow
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This workflow consolidates how new tech is introduced through the Labs team and how it gets processed to Consulting team to apply for projects and bring awareness of our tech expertise.

item.title: Reward Model & Nomination
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our Tech Labs is a hub of continuous learning and application of advanced technologies. This program is designed to celebrate contributions at various levels, from enhancing knowledge to contributing to business growth.

item.title: December Forward Engineering 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This month, we have focused on revamping how we learn, familiarize, and work with tech. We are excited to announce that we have updated our Forward Engineering to better reflect the feedback and insights from our Labs team, Operations Team, and Consulting Team.
